    • Method Detail

      • sendInvitation

        void sendInvitation(GroupId groupId,
                    PeerId peerId,
                    java.lang.String text,
                    long timestamp)
        Sends an invitation to share the given group with the given contact
        Parameters:
        groupId - Identifier of the shared group
        peerId - Identifier of the contact the group is shared with
        text - small text included in the invitation
        timestamp - the invitation has been sent

      • respondToInvitation

        void respondToInvitation(GroupId groupId,
                         PeerId peerId,
                         boolean accept)
        Peer response to group invitation
        Parameters:
        groupId - Identifier of the shared group
        peerId - Identifier of the contact the group is shared with
        accept - response of the contact to the invite (true if accepted false otherwise)

      • isSharedWith

        Parameters:
        groupId - Identifier of the shared group
        Returns:
        the contact Identifiers of the contacts the given group is shared with
